name: Skin Editor Matte Foundation - N 04: 12-Hour Flawless Coverage for Perfect Skin
description:
Skin Editor Matte Foundation - N 04: Your Perfect Complexion Solution

Skin Editor Matte Foundation - N 04 delivers flawless coverage with a natural matte finish that lasts all day. This premium foundation is specially formulated to control shine while providing medium to full coverage that feels lightweight on your skin. 💫

The N 04 shade is perfectly balanced for medium skin tones with neutral undertones, making it an ideal match for a wide range of complexions. The innovative formula of Skin Editor Matte Foundation blends seamlessly into your skin, effectively concealing imperfections without settling into fine lines or pores.

Product Information

Size30ml / 1.0 fl oz
ShadeN 04 (Medium with Neutral Undertones)
Product TypeLiquid Foundation
FinishMatte
CoverageMedium to Full (Buildable)

Key Features of Skin Editor Matte Foundation - N 04

  • Oil-controlling formula that keeps shine at bay for up to 12 hours ⏱️
  • Non-comedogenic and dermatologist-tested for sensitive skin
  • Enriched with skin-loving ingredients including Vitamin E and Hyaluronic Acid
  • Transfer-resistant and long-wearing formula
  • Protects with SPF 15 for daily sun protection

The Skin Editor Matte Foundation collection was developed after extensive research into diverse skin tones and textures. The result is a foundation that not only covers but actually improves your skin's appearance over time with continued use.

Application Tips for Skin Editor Matte Foundation - N 04

For best results, apply with a damp beauty sponge or foundation brush after prepping skin with moisturizer. The formula is buildable, allowing you to customize your coverage from medium to full without looking cakey. Set with a translucent powder for extended wear in humid conditions. 🧴

Frequently Asked Question

Is Skin Editor Matte Foundation suitable for oily skin?
Yes! Skin Editor Matte Foundation - N 04 is specifically designed to work exceptionally well for oily and combination skin types. The oil-controlling formula helps absorb excess sebum throughout the day while maintaining a fresh, matte finish without drying out your skin.

Complete your flawless look with our Brightening Concealer, Translucent Setting Powder, and Mattifying Primer for a truly perfected complexion that lasts from morning to night.
